name: Zofus Advokat & Konsulentfirma
goal: Lobbying towards EU-institutions mainly in relation to initiatives and legislation regarding climate, food and environment.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumers, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Danish representative of the following organisations:
BatteriForeningen - Danish branch of European Portable Battery Association EPBA
Margarine Foreningen - Danish Margarine Association Plantebranchen - Danish Plant-based Foods Organisation
-
Initiatives related to EU climate, food and environment (Waste) legislation.
Of special actual interest:
Production of plant based proteins, labelling of plant based food products, the upcoming revision of the batteries directive, circular economy and sustainable plant based foods
